resources.string: Con JackSMS puoi inviare SMS gratis tramite i vari servizi internet che lo permettono, inviare SMS low cost acquistando pacchetti di messaggi dai vari fornitori
JackSMS internal server error. Send log to developer (in the Preferences) to alert him about the problem.\n %s
Error: cannot find captcha session id... Maybe a JackSMS server error?\n\nSend log to developer (in the Preferences) if the problem persists.
Strange, no templates... Maybe a JackSMS server error?\n\nSend log to developer (in the Preferences) if the problem persists.
Strange, no captcha... Maybe a JackSMS server error?\n\nSend log to developer (in the Preferences) if the problem persists.
No templates to use. First download templates list and then relaunch the command.
User services stored in the JackSMS site added to the list.
No user services stored in the JackSMS found.
